name: Trembling Tomb
description:
!!IMPORTANT!!: Remember to turn on the music in the main menu with the slider bottom right corner in the menu.

You always seek bigger and better places to rob. This time you will do a bit of grave robbing. But watch out! The mare you steal, the more the pyramid will collapse.

Trembling Tomb of Impending Doom is an action packed puzzle platformer were the goal is to get as many points as fast as possible.

Controls:

  • Movement: A and D
  • Jump: Space
  • Music Volume slider can be found in the menu

If you ask, I can maybe provide downloads for other platforms.

Disclaimer: This game was made for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam  with the theme: Unstable. Enjoy :D

If you guys are completly out of you mind, and donate a total of 10 dollars, I will make a full game out of this with more temples, more treasures, more polish and more less bugs.
